summary: Ari's teenage lifestyle in the big city is disrupted as he is sent by his mother to live with his uninvolved father and his grandmother in a small fishing village.
cast: Rade Serbedzija|Ingvar Sigurdsson|Atli Oskar Fjalarsson|Arndís Hrönn Egilsdóttir|Arna Magnea Danks|Katla M. Þorgeirsdóttir|Nanna Kristín Magnúsdóttir|Víkingur Kristjánsson|Jarkko Lahti|Kristbjörg Kjeld|Pálmi Gestsson|Rakel Björk Björnsdóttir|Eva Sigurdardottir|Benedikt Benediktson|Júlíus Þorfinnsson|Eyþór Jóvinsson|Elín Árnadóttir|Valgeir Skagfjörð
keywords: grandmother|coming of age|father son relationship|absent mother|alcoholism
title: Sparrows (Gorriones)
